        check_xy_same_size = same_size([x, y], ctx)

            and check_xy_small

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x, y, z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_yz_small = is_small(y, ctx) and is_small(z, ctx)
        check_yz_light = is_light(y, ctx) and is_light(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark
            and check_yz_small
            and check_yz_light
        ):
            results.append([x, y, z])
    return results
